Nebojsa Serafimovski

Engineering Manager

About Me

Hi, I’m Nebojsa, I’m primarily a software developer, partly a DevOps Engineer, sometimes a System Architect, even a Solution Architect, but currently working as an Engineering Manager @ Happiest Baby.

I’ve been working with computers and tools my entire life, but lately I mostly hangout with Golang, NodeJS, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes and people :)

Projects

Happiest Baby App @ Happiest Baby

Product

Supervised the implementation and launch of more than 10 Happiest Baby initiatives such as introduction of in-app subscriptions in the Happiest Baby App, support for tracking baby’s activity in the Happiest Baby App, development of an AI chatbot on the Happiest Baby Website and many more.

SNOO Smart Sleeper @ Happiest Baby

Product

Led a team that worked on creating and maintaining backend systems for controlling the SNOO device through the mobile app.

eCommerce Platform @ Happiest Baby

Product

Platform for buying and renting Happiest Baby merchandise.

Affordability API @ Basiq

Product

Developed micro-services on AWS platform that specialize in credit risk estimation and income verification based on user’s bank account and transaction history.

Enrich API @ Basiq

Product

Development of bank transaction enrichment services on AWS platform that classify a single transaction, determine location in which it took place and find a potential merchant receiver.

Connect API @ Basiq

Product

Development of web crawlers that scrape bank account information and transaction history for the purpose of having one API for accessing financial data for any kind of bank.

CryptoVote

https://github.com/nebser/crypto-vote

POC for an electronic voting system that is based on a proof-of-stake blockchain.

MicroJava Compiler

https://github.com/nebser/mj-compiler

A compiler for a simplified version of the java programming language - MicroJava. The whole flow was split into 4 phases - lexical analysis, syntax analysis, semantic analysis and code generator.

ARM-like Assembler

https://github.com/nebser/assembler

C++ Implementation of a primitive assembler for an ARM-like assembly language

Education

University of Belgrade

BSc Computer Science

I got my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science at the University of Belgrade, Faculty of Electrical Engineering. For the purpose of writing my thesis I built a POC for a distributed voting system based on a custom built proof-of-stake blockchain.
